Measure.name: # Order items
Measure.description: The number of ordered products

Measure.name: Product revenue
Measure.description: The price of the ordered products as shown in the cart

Measure.name: Shipping revenue
Measure.description: Revenue generated based on the price of the items and delivery fee (if an order has more than one item the freight value is split between items)

CalculatedMember.name: Revenue
CalculatedMember.description: The total cart value of the order

CalculatedMember.name: Avg. revenue per order item
CalculatedMember.description: The average revenue made in this order per order item

Cube.name: Order items
Cube.description: Items purchased within each order made at Olist Store

Measure.name: Avg. days since last order
Measure.description: Average number of days after the last order fulfillment by this seller

Measure.name: # Orders
Measure.description: Number of orders with at-least one item fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: # Order items
Measure.description: Number of items fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: # Deliveries
Measure.description: Number of orders (with at-least one item fulfilled by this seller) that were already delivered to the customer

Measure.name: # Customers
Measure.description: Number of customers with items fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: Revenue (lifetime)
Measure.description: The lifetime revenue generated of items fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: Total freight value
Measure.description: Total freight value of items fulfilled by this seller

CalculatedMember.name: Avg. revenue per order
CalculatedMember.description: The average revenue that the seller made per order

Cube.name: Customers
Cube.description: People that made at least one order

Measure.name: # Orders
Measure.description: Number of orders placed by this customer

Measure.name: # Order items
Measure.description: Number of items purchased by this customer

Measure.name: CLV
Measure.description: The lifetime revenue generated from items purchased by this customer

Cube.name: Products
Cube.description: Products that were at least once sold

Dimension.name: Product category name
Dimension.description: The category name describing the group of products (e.g. "health_beuty" or "computers_accessories")

Hierarchy.allMemberName: All Product category name

Measure.name: # Orders
Measure.description: The number of orders placed containing this product

Measure.name: # Order items
Measure.description: How many times this product has been sold (at the time of the last DWH import)

Measure.name: # Customers
Measure.description: The number of unique customers that bought this product at least once

Measure.name: Revenue (all time)
Measure.description: The revenue generated from the product since the beginning it has been sold

Measure.name: Total shipping value
Measure.description: Total shipping value payed for this product since the beginning it has been sold

Measure.name: # Closed deals
Measure.description: The number of closed deals

Measure.name: # Orders
Measure.description: Number of orders with at-least one item fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: # Order items
Measure.description: Number of items fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: # Deliveries
Measure.description: Number of orders (with at-least one item fulfilled by this seller) that were already delivered to the customer

Measure.name: # Customers
Measure.description: Number of customers with items fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: Revenue (lifetime)
Measure.description: The lifetime revenue generated of items fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: Total freight value
Measure.description: Total freight value of items fulfilled by this seller

Measure.name: Declared product catalog size
Measure.description: Lead declared catalog size. Informed on contact

Measure.name: Declared monthly revenue
Measure.description: Lead declared estimated monthly revenue. Informed on contact

CalculatedMember.name: # Order per customer
CalculatedMember.description: Average number of orders per customer
